summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gaming Headphones Chamvict Xbox One Headset with Stereo Sound Ps4 Headset with Mic Noise Canceling for PS4,PC,Laptop,Cell Phone,Xbox,Find Enemies Before They Find You
Review Date: 2019/06/22
Store: Chamvict
Product Description: ['Why to choose us', "1. 【Splendid stereo audio output】Bring you an immersive game experience with stereo sound.You can get clear sound and accurately judge the enemies’ direction especially in “Playerunknown's Battlegrounds” 2. 【360° Noise canceling mic】We adopt intelligent chip to cancel outside noise.Just enjoy your own game world.You can judge the enemies direction and shoot in time without any noise.Victory is yours!The mic is flexible and can be adjusted to different angle for 360° 3. 【Comfy for long time wearing】With an extreme light of 0.87pounds, it is professionally designed for long time wearing and relieve your tiredness.The earmuff is breathable and soft, which can give your ear a comfy touch with less stress and keep cool when gaming for long time 4. 【Skin-friendly earmuff】Made of superior PU leather material, the earmuff is friendly to your skin 5. 【Convenient volume and mic adjustment】You can adjust game sound volume via the pulley and turn on/off mic via the switch anytime when don’t use it", 'Tips for PS4', '1. Plug 3.5mm cable into the console 2. Long press PS4 button and go to system setting 3. Go to “PERIPHERAL MACHINE”, ”ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES”, choose “OUTPUT TO THE HEADPHONES”, select “ALL AUDIO”', 'Multiple platform compatibility', '★Play station 4 ★Nintendo switch/3DS ★Cell phone with 3.5mm audio interface ★Xbox one/360: It need a microsoft adapter(not included) when connect to old version xbox one ★Laptop/PC/macbook: Need a pc extension cord(included), plug mic and audio cord into your PC, laptop, macbook', 'Specification', '★Drive Diameter: 50mm ★Frequency: 20HZ-20KHZ ★Sensitivity: 102±3DB ★Mic Diameter: 4.0×1.5mm ★Mic Sensitivity: -38±3DB ★Cable Length: 6.6ft ★Size: 8.1×4.1×8.7inch ★N.W.: 0.873pounds ★G.W.: 1.12Pounds']
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Chamvict', 'Color': 'Black', 'Form Factor': 'Over Ear', 'Connectivity Technology': 'Wired', 'Special Feature': 'Noise Canceling, Microphone Included', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 7.8 x 4.3 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Dongguan Guanbiao Trading Co.,Ltd'}
Review Text: Used this on a PS4 Pro and it worked great- clear sound from the game and in chatting. It's bulky but not heavy and comfortable to wear- even for hours at a time. The mic is a good length and able to bend a bit, if needed. The cord seems durable and connected well to the PS4 controller. The controls for the headset itself all work good. All around, a good headset 👍
Review Title: All around, a good headset
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Padded Rhinestone Crystal Headband Bejewled Wide Velvet Hairband Statement Bridal Wedding Party Headwear Hair Hoop Hair Accessories (rainbow)
Review Date: 2020/08/22
Store: JERTOCLE
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Color': 'Gold,Silver,Rainbow', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Pearl, Cloth, Rhinestone, Crystal', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 5.4 x 1.85 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '783911261158'}
Review Text: This is definitely a statement headband! For whatever you decide to use it for, it's big (thick/height wise), flashy and very noticeable…yet very pretty and has a lot of bling 🙌🏽 My 10 year old loves it too and says it's like a queen's headband. The soft lining underneath does help make it comfortable and it fits well!
Review Title: Bling!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hemp Lotion for Dry Skin - Soothing Rose Flower & Aloe Hydrate Your Complexion - Non-Greasy, Vegan, 7Oz, 250Mg Hemp, Fragrance & Paraben Free - Guayaquil By La La Leaf
Review Date: 2020/09/27
Store: LA LA LEAF
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LA LA LEAF', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '7.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '8.19 x 2.28 x 2.17 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002750125'}
Review Text: Having health issues that causes very dry skin, I appreciate a lotion with better ingredients and moisturizing. This one isn't as thick as some but it's doing the job hydrating. It's a great size too!
Review Title: Nice and great size
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Altaba Long Wavy Wigs Ombre gray Wig Synthetic Wigs Middle Part Natural Looking Heat Resistant Party Cosplay Full Wig for Women
Review Date: 2020/11/07
Store: Altaba
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Altaba', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'UPC': '788436507620'}
Review Text: Soft. Decent quality. Very pretty coloring with the black roots and silver-gray. The length and style look pretty, too. Fits good and is styled nicely. Looks good, overall like it!
Review Title: Cute!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hetianmei® Pink Rhinestone Headbands for Women，Jewel Headband，Bling Diamond Headbands Crystal Fashion Sparkly Jeweled Thick Headbands for Woman
Review Date: 2020/12/27
Store: Hetianmei
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Color': 'Pink', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Crystal Rhinestone, Crystal', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 5.51 x 1.38 inches; 3.53 Ounces'}
Review Text: It's really cute and sparkly. Quality is fine but feels slightly off compared to other similar headbands in this price range that I've tried. Hopefully it holds up well, if taken care of. Slightly narrow fit but not too uncomfortable. Liking the look and color!
Review Title: Cute
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MAELYS VIRTUE Neck Firming Cream
Review Date: 2021/01/01
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MAELYS', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.76 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '3.46 x 3.39 x 2.8 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'B07PBWVV5K', 'Manufacturer': 'B4Y LABORATORIES LTD'}
Review Text: The skin on my neck has lost a lot of elasticity. I wouldn't say it's in bad shape but I feel it is for being in mid 30s. Having health stuff going on, former daily tanning machine user, former smoker and my weight goes up-and-down- all things that have contributed to my skin changes and my neck is no exception. This cream is soothing and leaves a lot of moisturize but not a lot of goop. I feel like my skin looks smoother, though I'm sure more consistent and long-term use will bring the most benefits and results. The texture of it is so creamy and thick and feels great on! Arrived sealed and packaged-up really well.
Review Title: Liking it
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Altaba Long Blonde Wavy Wigs for Women Ombre Blonde Middle Part Wigs Natural Looking Synthetic Wig Party Cosplay Wigs for Women Heat Resistant Fiber (Light Brown to Golden)
Review Date: 2021/03/25
Store: Altaba
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Altaba', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Package Dimensions': '12.2 x 8.5 x 2.44 inches; 9.14 Ounces'}
Review Text: Soft and pretty. I really like the length and the ombre coloring looks good. Stays fastened pretty well on it's own, though, I use a wig-grip band and it keeps in place well. Great for cosplay, dress-up or just because🙌🏼
Review Title: Like the look
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NOBLE Wigs for White Women Purple Lace Wigs for Black Women 27 Inch Long Curly Wavy Colored Wigs Middle Part Heat Resistant Synthetic Ombre Purple Wavy Wigs for Daily Party Cosplay Use
Review Date: 2021/04/18
Store: NOBLE
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'NOBLE', 'Package Dimensions': '13.78 x 7.76 x 2.44 inches; 14.07 Ounces'}
Review Text: The coloring looks really cool and pretty. I like that it's got the multiple colors, I personally haven't had many that do. The length and style combined with the colors is a lot of fun. It sheds a little. I try to be careful with the ends as they've been a little tangly but it's a costume wig so I often experience that with other costume wigs, especially with length and curls. Overall I really like it and think it looks good
Review Title: Fun and pretty!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NOBLE Synthetic HD Lace Wigs with Bangs 20 inches Synthetic Natural Wavy Wigs with Air Bangs Ombre Brown Blonde Color
Review Date: 2021/04/18
Store: NOBLE
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'NOBLE', 'Package Dimensions': '13.79 x 7.8 x 2.21 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: Very pretty, soft and the coloring looks even better in person. I feel it's a nice wig, especially for it being more of a costume/cosplay type wig and for the price
Review Title: Liking it
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EMILIE HEATHE - Lip Atelier Lip Color | Sustainable, Cruelty-Free, Clean Beauty (Public)
Review Date: 2022/07/08
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Moisturizing,Clean', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Coverage': 'Buildable', 'Specialty': 'Cruelty-free,Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.13 x 1.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '810033380181'}
Review Text: I had never heard of this brand before and was also looking forward to trying this out because I feel like this shade wouldn't look right on me- I guess because I have a lot of redness in my face. So getting the opportunity to try it out allowed me to branch out and try a shade I would normally be hesitant to buy. I'm glad because I love it! I ended-up loving the shade and how it looks on me. It applies so smoothly and even feels moisturizing while wearing. I love the shimmer- it's enough to be noticeable and pretty but isn't too much. Happy with it!
Review Title: Happy with it!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Overall I really like it and think it looks good

So getting the opportunity to try it out allowed me to branch out and try a shade I would normally be hesitant to buy. I'm glad because I love it! I ended-up loving the shade and how it looks on me. It applies so smoothly and even feels moisturizing while wearing. I love the shimmer- it's enough to be noticeable and pretty but isn't too much. Happy with it!

target_interaction.title: Likeable liquid lipstick
target_interaction.text:
To me the shade on the product picture looks like it might have a little pink in it but I don't notice it when I apply it. Maybe that's just me 🤔 Regardless, I feel the shade is very pretty...and definitely is metallic.

It's also very long-lasting- to the point that later when taking it off, I used both an oil cleanser and makeup remover. Transferring is minimal. It actually stays a little sticky the whole time while wearing it, so that makes it a little surprising that it's so long lasting- since many liquids dry completely. It's not overly sticky, so I didn't find it bothersome.

Applies smoothly- it does feel like a velvety, whipped texture

If you're concerned about the appearance of lines on your lips with a liquid lipstick- I feel this is one makes them a bit pronounced.

Overall, for a liquid lipstick, I think it's pretty good. Has rich pigment and has a stand-out metallic look

Packaging is pretty
target_interaction.title_meta: Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL
features: LIQUID LIPSTICK: Lip Whip is a long-lasting, smudge proof, and waterproof liquid lipstick that goes on as a liquid and dries as a metallic matte. Provides all-day coverage in just one pigmented application. Stickiness can result if product is not allowed ample time to dry or if product is layered with more than 3 layers.

SMUDGE PROOF: Don't worry about eating your makeup with our Lip Whips. They stay on your lips not your food! Our Lips Whips won't stop you from kissing a loved one or biting into something messy. Apply your Lip Whip and leave it at home. Don't worry about reapplying.
BERRIED: Our Berried Lip Whip is a metallic red with hints of deep purple. We recommend Berried as a topping. It looks great on top of Raspberry Tiramisu or She's Just Jelly.
INGREDIENTS: We focus on using high quality and heatlhy ingredients. Our products are cruelty-free and contain vegan and paraben free ingredients with your skincare in mind.

BEAUTY BAKERIE: A powerful story of resilience and inspiration, Cashmere Nicole founded Beauty Bakerie in 2011 with the mission to be sweet and sweeten the lives of others. The Beauty Bakerie brand is a direct reflection of Cashmere's perseverance and passion for high-quality, healthy ingredients that enhance everyone's beauty every day.
description: Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.
